title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.71 - Parcels acceptable for checking
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.71 - Parcels acceptable for checking

State Regulations

Any parcel will be accepted for checking except: (a) parcels exceeding in size 24 inches by 24
inches by 45 inches; (b) parcels
having or capable of producing an offensive odor or likely to damage other
parcels or endanger persons or property; (c) fragile, inflammable, explosive or
otherwise objectionable parcels or heavy or bulky parcels such as trunks, baby
coaches (unless of the collapsible type) etc.; (d) parcels containing money, jewelry, negotiable papers and like valuables; (e) parcels in a leaking or loose
condition; (f) parcels having a
value in excess of $225. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1220.71

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
